application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 24/03519/FUL: SuDS (4), energy statement (5), reduced water consumption (6), construction management plan (7), hard and soft landscaping (9), site enclosure (11) and biodiversity enhancements (12) in respect of sub-division of site and erection of an end-of-terraced 2-storey dwelling house.
decision_conditions: The information submitted in respect of discharging conditions 5, 7 and 11 is considered insufficient and inadequate as it will fail to ensure that CO2 emission reduction targets are met, the development is undertaken in a manner which minimises its' effect on the local area and pedestrian safety, thereby considered unacceptable and contrary to Policies DMD49, DM47, DM48, DMD50 and DMD51 of the Enfield Development Management Document (2014) and London Plan Policies  T4, T7, and SI 2.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LHA Maximum Height Level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet).
LLA Maximum height level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 300 metres in height (984.2 feet)
CILRES CIL ZONE: Lower Rate Eastern Zone - RATE: Â£40 per square metre
